title: Liz Looks Back
text:
Host of FOX Business Network's The Claman Countdown, Liz Claman revisits some of her most inspirational guests, including James Byler, former Marine Captain turned Wall Street trader. James discusses the challenging journey he faced after losing both legs in Afghanistan after stepping on an IED.

Liz also speaks with Anne Beiler, founder of Auntie Anne's Pretzels. Anne shares the inspiring story of her Amish upbringing, and how her pretzels gave her a platform to do good.

﻿

Follow Liz on Twitter: @LizClaman
description: Host of FOX Business Network's The Claman Countdown, Liz Claman revisits some of her most inspirational guests.
